snippet: Regulators are pushing for changes that will affect derivatives. | G.E. is in talks to sell its appliances unit. | Coca-Cola announced that it had acquired a stake in Monster Beverage. | Bitcoin’s pop may exceed its potential.
abstract: Regulators are pushing for changes that will affect derivatives. | G.E. is in talks to sell its appliances unit. | Coca-Cola announced that it had acquired a stake in Monster Beverage. | Bitcoin’s pop may exceed its potential.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Tension Mounts Over Derivatives
